timeperd.current: Data is based on transit system and ridership data from Oct 2010

descript.abstract:
Transit On-Board Survey conducted in fall 2010 as part of the 2010 Travel Behavior Inventory (TBI).
The TBI is a battery of surveys conducted 2010-2012 to support transportation planning and transportation forecast model development.
Dataset includes record surveyed in 2010, as well as some records from 2005 for routes that were not surveyed in 2010. Four expansion factors were developed, all matching systemwide totals: Allsys- All records, at route level ODsys-All records with O/D information, at route level ODTPsys- All records with O/D and purpose information, at route level ODTP_Geosys- All records with O/D and purpose information, at segment level
Please refer to documentation for information about sample plan, survey instruments, field implementation, and data expansion.
descript.purpose: To assist the Twin Cities Metropolitan Planning Organization with transportation planning and project programming in the Twin Cities region.
descript.supplinf: 2010 transit system and orgins/destinations of surveyed users

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County, Sherburne County

theme.themekey: Travel Behavior Inventory, TBI, transit, transit on-board survey, on-board, OBS

The Data were developed by the Metropolitan Council for its own internal business purposes. The Metropolitan Council does not represent or warrant that the Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the Data or your reliance on Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular Data to determine the limitations of the Data and the precision with which the Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.

stdorder.ordering:
This dataset is distributed on the internet by clicking below after 'Online Linkage'. Doing so will tell your browser to download a 'ZIP' file which will contain the following:
- Excel Tables - metadata for the dataset (.htm) - NOTICE.RTF, an important notice about this dataset that can be read by any word processing software.

overview.eaover: Data Dictionary is availability internally to the file

procstep.procdesc: Data was originally entered by hand from paper survey records filled out on-board transit vehicles. BoardLat/Lon and AlightLat/Lon were retrieved from GPS enabled bar-codfe scanning of paper surveys when handed out and returned.
